name: Final Response
description:
Final Response is an ultra brutal shooter dedicated to players who enjoy gore and visceral combat.

This game is build on Leaden Sky Update 4 engine - the goriest version of LS Demo before it began to focus on other aspects.

Final Response is a game with extremely advanced gore system and basic gameplay elements, but it does include some interessting things like stealth, dynamic lighting, day and night cycle and rain effects.

The game is very brutal, it features many gory mechanics such as surface based wound system, many amputation points for dismemberment, detailed blood spilling, permanent mess, prolonged death animations affected by physics and many more.

The game is made to be dark and edgy, but that's a part of it's charm.

name: Blue Revolver: Double Action
description:
After a long time in development and a fruitful public beta, Blue Revolver: Double Action is now available for all players. Go forth and flourish!

Double Action is a large, free update to our game. We wanted to give players the best possible version of the game. There's rebalancing, new weapons, new content, a ton of new features and options -- including a super-smooth 120Hz mode!

name: That's My Exploit Keeper!
description:
Exploit Keeper is a puzzle game, where you have to change the version of the game between the well developed one and the poorly developed one, to find the game bugs and exploit them to be able to continue the plot.
Badly programmed mechanics might be useful if used in the right place...

Between features that work poorly, repeating events and unindexed values, you will find every kind of nightmarish bug for beta testers!

name: 7 dní a 7 nocí
description:
7 dni a 7 noci ("7 Days and 7 Nights") is an erotic Czech adventure. You walk around town talking to people, picking up objects, and solving puzzles. The game is inspired and very similar to Sierra classic Leisure Suit Larry.

The story revolves around Venca Záhyb (Wenzel Ziegler in German, and Waszek Fałda in Polish) who one day receives a special job order from well-known millionaire Jonathan Smiht (parody for surname Smith). His orders: to protect his seven daughters from potential suitors. However, after a night spent in a pub with one Fanda Kořen who bets him one "lubr" that he can not claim all seven for himself, Venca's duties take on a whole new meaning.

He has one day with each daughter in which to win her heart. However, each woman will pose a unique challenge for Venca to overcome.

name: BooniePlanet

Explore a magical world where you collect adorable creatures called Boonies!
Upgrade your Boonies and teach them new tricks! Feed them, wash them, and play with them to keep them happy! Create and customize your own family of Boonies and show them off to all your friends!

name: Justine et la Pierre de Feu
description:
Justine et la Pierre de Feu is a point-and-click adventure game for 7-10 year-olds.

In the middle of the ocean there was once a small island where Justine and many other mice lived. This rocky islet was their only treasure. It sheltered them, fed them and protected them every day and every night. In winter, the mice stayed warm in the depths of their shelter.

One morning, hungry Justine went out in search of food. From a distance, she spotted a shiny spot at the bottom of a crevice, a small stone shimmering with a thousand lights. Justine immediately picked it up. When she returned to the village with her stone, all the mice ran to her and bombarded Justine with questions, because they all wanted nothing more than to possess such a treasure!

Your mission in this adventure is to help Justine and her friends find other shiny stones, or ‘fire stones’. Each mouse needs one!

name: Let's Fish
description:
It’s time to Go Fishing with Let’s Fish, the best fishing simulator and free online game of 2020!
Looking for free fishing games (bass fishing, ice fishing, fly fishing, sport fishing, big fish fishing and more) or best oudoor games? Great! Lets Fish offers the best summer fishing and winter fishing experience, so u don't have to search for any other hobby games anymore.

And guess what? You'll get 4 different game modes that each offer a unique take on the concept, a level editor to make and share your very own creations with the rest of the community, and a bunch of granular options to customise the gameplay to your liking :)

description: Climb ninja, climb! In this fast-paced ninja running game, your goal is to climb as high as you can while avoiding evil squirrels, dive-bombing birds, enemy ninjas, throwing stars, exploding bombs & more! Effortlessly scale the side of buildings with ninja agility. Tap to jump from one wall to the other, slashing enemies in your way. Hit three matching enemies in a row for a bonus power-up boost. Grab shields for protection. Watch out for obstacles & ledges. Stay alive!

name: NinJump Rooftops
description:
Run for your life! How far can you get?

NinJump Rooftops is a fast-paced game where your goal is to jump between rooftops, avoid obstacles, defeat enemies, and stay alive as long as you can. Grab coins & jade crystals along the way to upgrade your ninja abilities. Hit 3 matching enemies in a row for an epic power-up boost. Master the mighty ninja "double jump", where you jump, then jump again in mid-air, defying all laws of physics & logic. Whatever you do, just don't fall off the roof or let the baddies get you. Stay alive!

name: Bardia
description:
Bardia is a story of gallantry, courage and historical facts based on Alexander of Macedon’s attack on Iran, the circumstances around the Achaemenid Persian Empire and the sacrifice and resistance of Aryobarzan and the brave soldiers of Iran. Through action-adventure gameplay, the story unfolds itself.

Bardia, an adventurous puzzle game, appeals to both domestic and international audiences. Bardia, familiarizes Iranians with historical figures and segments from their history. For the international audience, it shows the battle that really took place between Alexander of Macedon and Aryobarzan, contrary to what the film 300 depicted.

Bardia is based on historical documents and readings of sections of the Achaemenid period; and for the first time, all of Persepolis, Iran’s most historic site, has been built and put to display in a computer game.

A 3D graphic game, Bardia pays special attention to the architecture and clothing during the time of the Achaemenids: Particular attention has been given to the type of clothing military personal wore during this time.

name: Dark Trip
description:
Dark Trip is a psychedelic VR escape room where the hero is forced to use drugs investigating a sadomasochistic lab.

The game of Escape Room genre features Lavcraftian setting, Psychedelic Trips gameplay mechanics and the goals to collect and investigate evidences. Some event in the game are inspired by David Lynch's and Terry Gilliam's movies.

- Experiences Psychedelic Trips. Use VR to immerse yourself into psychedelic experiences not possible on any other gaming platform.

- Investigate the Sadomasochistic Laboratory. Solve twisted riddles in surrealistic setting of physical and mental torture.

- Collect the Pieces of Horrible Truth. Search for clues, artifacts and diary pieces in each location to discover the dark story behind the events.

name: Math Sudoku
description:
Test your math skills and solve the puzzles using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

Math Sudoku combines Sudoku and Math which creates entertaining and challenging puzzles. Math Sudoku was created as a fun way to increase students logic and problem-solving skills, but Math Sudoku is for everyone. There are over 632 puzzles!

name: UOGamers
description:
UOGamers is a unique flavor of Ultima Online brought to you by UOGamers and the developers of RunUO. It is a mix of classical and modern Ultima Online, based on the game in its PvP glory days. The shard features only the Felucca facet, where combat is unrestricted in most parts of Britannia. Additionally, factions, guild wars, the dueling system and regular tournaments held by staff.

Custom dungeons and special monsters throughout the world provide a challenging PvE experience. Customized housing is also available to provide for creative players who wish to build their own place in the world. If crafting is more your thing, then you will enjoy the all-custom, balanced, bulk order reward system, offering power scrolls to further enhance your skills.

UOGamers is backed up by a massive community ready to help and make your game experience better.

Features of Hybrid:

Skill cap of 700
Stats cap of 225
Fast skill gain
Felucca only
Factions, Hero/Evil system, Order/Chaos
Dueling system
Poker
New guild system
Customizable houses
Greater dungeon monsters
Paragons (Mobs of the Month)
Extensive rare item economy
Active in-game staff
Rift System
Regular PvP-themed events

We hope you enjoy your stay here, and thanks for considering UOGamers for your best in class gaming experience.

name: Crazy Shipping
description: Crazy Shipping is a free-to-play space trading and logistics management game. Players run a transportation company using ships piloted by cats, delivering cargo and passengers between stations across the solar system. The game features a risk-reward system where players balance legitimate deliveries against more profitable but risky "hot" cargo, while managing station alert levels and random events. Progress is made by expanding your fleet, purchasing stations, and upgrading facilities using currency earned through gameplay and optional in-game purchases.

description:

After the events of Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, Kain has created a vampiric empire in the world of Nosgoth. One of Kain's children and underlings, Raziel, is disgraced and cast down by a jealous Kain after surpassing him by growing wings and woken up centuries after in a corrupted form to get revenge against his once-brothers.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2 Remastered
description:
Experience Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2 in original form or with remastered graphics.

Soul Reaver 2 picks up where Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver left off, with Raziel having just plunged through the Chronoplast time portal in his relentless pursuit of Kain. Over the course of his quest for revenge, Raziel must unearth the mysteries of Nosgoth’s ancient races, expose the machinations behind the corruption of the Pillars, and the vampire genocide. Throughout the game, Raziel acquires numerous new abilities, weapon enhancements, and spells, all of which are critical to the completion of his epic adventure.

Soul Reaver is a third-person combat adventure filled with devious puzzles and kick-ass combat. Fly, swim, jump, and even travel from the material world to the spectral realm to overcome obstacles and conquer your enemies. With over 40 abilities to choose from, no two fights will ever be the same.

In Legendary Heroes Unchained Epoch 1, players embark on a thrilling journey, honing their skills in dungeon exploration, interdimensional battles, and strategic Guild-building:

description:
Unlike normal fighting games, this game is not based on remaining HP, but on how easily you die depending on the amount of damage you've taken. If you play well, it's possible to survive even with 999% damage! There are no specific combo patterns like in fighting games (adapt your attacks to suit the situation), and no need to input complicated commands! Just flick the buttons and send your favorite characters flying!

And best of all, up to four players can play! Have fun with a large group of people! Use the unique features of each character to survive!

name: Magician Lord 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Magician Lord that had been intended for the Neo Geo Pocket.

name: The King of Dragons
description: SNES Port of the arcade game with the same name. Changes it was given includes reducing the number of simultaneous players down to two, reducing the sizes of the in game sprites moderately, and it being possible to assign the magic attack and shield defense to different buttons.

name: Card Guesser: Red or Black
description: Card Guesser: Red or Black is a simple and exciting guessing game. Players try to guess if the next card will be a red or a black card. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for testing your luck in a quick, engaging format! Are you feeling lucky?

name: Cosmic Royale
description: Get ready for frantic free-to-play racing battle royale in a crazy sci-fi universe! Take on 40 players in an intense competition packed with obstacles and gravity-defying challenges.

name: Evil Timefall
description: Evil Timefall - hardcore FPS, where you fight against medieval evil. Immerse yourself in dark horror, where you kill zombie knights, witches and demons. Dive into the meat slaughter, where cruel enemies attack you from the darkness. Upgrade guns to execute more servants of the bloody lord.

name: Minor Minion
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Island 2.5: El Parque de las Pesadillas
description: Sin descripción

name: Vextorial
description: Vextorial is a Multi-Dimensional puzzle-platformer where you play as Pilo, a 2D creature exploring a 3D space. Solve unique mind-bending puzzles by shifting gravity around you to explore an ancient ruin and uncover the mystery of your lost memories.

name: Logiart Grimoire: Emil's Magic Training, Part 1
description:
Emil has begun training to create Logiart puzzles, just in case!
Feel free to try out the records of his hard work.
It seems he still needs more training, but maybe he’s already managed to create a perfect puzzle now and then...?

name: Plants vs. Zombies Hybrid Version
description:
Plants vs. Zombies: Hybrid Version is a mod of the original Plants vs. Zombies created by 潜艇伟伟迷 (SubmarineWeiWeiPVZ) and his team.
The mod primarily features plants that are hybrids of two or multiple plants, combining said plants' attributes and abilities in unique ways. The mod also features zombies that wear armor from other zombies, new armor types entirely, and zombies that similarly function as hybrids of one another.

name: Dirty Swamp
description: Dirty Swamp is a total conversion mod for Gothic II Gold Edition set in its own world and story with a revamped magic and combat system, new soundtrack and tons of new content ready to explore.

name: The Sheriff
description: A dynamic hide-and-seek for two players. The Sheriff must find and kill the outlaw before all villagers die. Each round see different powers applied to each player to make each game unique. Pay attention to your back!

name: Bunnies Huddled Together
description: An interesting jigsaw puzzle game with irregular pieces featuring beautiful rabbit illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

name: Liminal Universe
description: An exploration game that delves into the depths of loneliness. Wander through empty rooms, search for signs of an abandoned world, and listen to the sounds around you. No dangerous chases, just silence and an empty world to explore.

name: Street Fighter 5: Guile
description: Sin descripción

name: Ruined Nurse
description: Explore the hospital by Thwarting the creatures that are trying to stop you and solving puzzles. Successfully install the internet and surprise customer...

name: Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor
description: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.

description: Unleash Tactical Furry Fury!

name: Freddy Farmer
description: Freddy Farmer is a retro arcade style game with 16-bit pixel art graphics in the style of the 80s/90s where you can test your skills as a player.

name: 2 in 1: Trash Punk & Knights and Guns
description:
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!
Knight in shining armor, fight your way... with Guns!

name: Flower Power: The Adventures of Magical Plants
description: The story follows Valentina, a brave and curious young girl who discovers a magical garden hidden near her home

name: Eggconsole Riglas PC-8801
description: Seeking the secret of Beljuna, May Osborn set out from the village. What he saw, guided by the crystal, was..

name: Block Blaster DX!
description: New block puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.

name: Kaimyou Maker
description: This is a tool that automatically generates, manages, and edits Kaimyou. It can also issue Kaimyou certificates and save them in an album, and it can be used as an Ihai.

name: Winter Games Collection
description: Get ready for endless winter fun with a fantastic collection of arcade-inspired games!

name: A Loddle to the Left
description: A Little to the Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Anime Girls: Graceful Goddess
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Jerry Anker and the Quest to get Love
description: Tonight is the night! Next door at the spooky mansion, the most famous girls are throwing the hottest party in history!

name: Love Anime Boys Club: Language and Date Zodiac Signs
description: Discover this adventure through the city, where your mission is to win over the 12 most irresistible guys, each with a unique personality guided by their zodiac sign.

name: Me And Gamer Girl: Gamer-joshi to Hikikomori
description: The person behind the beautiful avatar is... a real-life beauty!? As you meet and become close with the beautiful gamer girl, your relationship blossoms into romance...

name: Games Advent Calendar 2024 Bundle
description: More fun during the holiday season with two Advent Calendars full of games!

name: Eggconsole Xak II PC-8801mkIISR
description: This game not only enhances the visual beauty but also improves the action elements. Embark on an adventure in the world of Xak as the brave warrior Latok!

name: Hidden Gems Collection: 3 in 1
description: This bundle contains: - Warm Snow - NOOB - The Factionless - Murder Mystery Machine

name: Cartoon Party Collection: 3 in 1
description: This bundle contains: - The Smurfs - Village Party - Inspector Gadget - Mad Time Party - Garfield Lasagna Party

name: Agatha Christie Collection 2
description: Discover the Agatha Christie games through this bundle of 2 games including : Agatha Christie - The London Case Agatha Christie - The Murder on the Orient Express

description: Conquer Mars, fend off alien threats, and secure your path to survival!

name: Karaoke Party: Sing & Dance
description: Immerse yourself in this fun children's karaoke where you can sing and watch animals dance to the rhythm of the music.

name: Farming Harvester Simulator 2025: Deluxe Edition
description: Harvest the Future: Master the Fields in Farming Harvester Simulator 2025 Deluxe Edition!

name: Anime Girls: Busty Baseball
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Hogwarts Legacy + Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions Deluxe Editions Bundle
description: The Ultimate Wizarding Bundle delivers the best gaming experience the wizarding world has to offer.

name: Duckweed
description: Eat the Duckweed!

name: Anime Girls: Gorgeous Girlfriend
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Aerofly FS Flight Simulator
description: Welcome aboard, Captain. Fly around the world to thousands of airports in detailed aircraft with 3D cockpits. Prove your skills in many challenging missions.

name: Eggconsole Ys MSX2
description: The landmark first game of an ongoing popular title. Master the 'half-character shift' and embark on an adventure in the land of Esteria!

name: Bunny Zoo: Animal Battle Royale
description: Choose your champion, master your skills, and conquer the animal kingdom—are you ready for the ultimate battle?

name: Bear Simulator: Ragnarok's Rise Survival
description: Become the bear hero in Bear Simulator: Ragnarok’s Rise – prepare for mythic chaos!

name: Abyss: Backrooms Pools Horror
description: Sin descripción

name: Daedalic Turn-Based Bundle
description: This bundle contains three turn-based games for you to plan and execute your perfect strategies!

name: Hentai Girls: Otaku Love
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Rome
description: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: 10-in-1 Games Bundle for Kids & Toddlers
description:
Endless fun for little hands.
From farm to safari,
let curiosity bloom!

name: Ironfall Invasion
description: Join the resistance and reclaim Earth from an army of invaders who won’t go down without a fight!

name: Monkey Island Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Island: Carnaval Vudu
description: Sin descripción

name: Nubby's Number Factory
description: A plinko-style roguelike where you work at a number factory. Launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to make bigger and bigger numbers! But beware, if you fail to meet your number quota, the sun will explode.

name: Monkey Island: Carnival of the Damned
description: Sin descripción

name: Harborde
description: Harborde combines survivors/roguelite gameplay with base building and management.

name: Spires, The Wailing City
description: Vondur's first map since 2010. Medium sized map in the city setting.

name: Bible Trivia
description: Sin descripción

name: SingStar Russian Hit
description: SingStar Russian Hit is a special edition of popular series of karaoke games for the Russian region. This edition includes famous artist like: Zhuki, Dima Bilan, Maksim and the others.

name: Hidden Cats 2: Crafts
description: All professions are important, all professions are needed! Explore a world of crafts, each with a place for cats. Find them and the world will be colored!

name: 100 New Year Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the New Year Location, full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of New Yearlocations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: Extrasensoric
description:
Extrasensoric is an arcade/role-playing game set during a space battle between the Empire and new unknown enemies - the Klezians.

The player will have to decide the outcome of this war almost single-handedly. But how to decide? Here you are given a choice. Your decisions will determine both the fate of the Klezians and the fate of the Empire.

name: Find All: Christmas
description: What's that ringing filled the air? A wonder is coming! Santa has once again received many letters of wishes. The production conveyor have started! The Christmas season is upon us! Find 150 different items to give presents to everyone!

name: Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker
description:
Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker is an every-direction action shooter that emphasizes the exhilaration of defeating waves of enemy hordes.

The game uses a quest-based structure in which you clear quests, earn rewards, and use them to strengthen your characters for the next mission.

Skilfully dispose of the enemies coming at you from every direction and enjoy building up your characters.

name: Hidden Winter Things
description: Enter a winter fairy tale with cat people, elves and cute atmosphere. Explore a cozy forest and Santa's workshop, uncovering over 300 hidden objects, from winter sweets to magical surprises. Relax with hand-painted scenes and soothing melodies in this enchanting seasonal adventure.

name: Hidden Cats: Snow
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Snow" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Christmas
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Christmas" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats of Mars
description: Take a break from daily life with this casual hidden object game. Each cat has its own unique personality and hiding style, making every discovery a delightful surprise.

name: Hidden Cats of Atlantis
description: Over 100 unique hidden cats waiting to be discovered

name: Cats Hidden in USA
description: Find hundreds of cats cats hiding in the good 'ol United States of America in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Drug Story: The First Chapters
description: Follow the story of a young boy who discovers one day that his older brother, Zack, is a drug dealer. He will try to convince him to stop this illegal activity, but it will turn into a big journey filled with battle against criminals. Defeat the Boss of the gang to save your brother, and the town.

name: A Tower's Will
description: A Tower’s Will is a 3D platform game where you have to climb a sentient tower that doesn’t want to be climbed. Will you rise victorious or tumble down in defeat?

name: Hidden Cats: Winter
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Winter" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Newton
description: Newton is a pixel art platformer. Collect apples, master gravity and set high scores in this simple but challenging adventure!

name: Heroes of the Seven Islands
description: A party-based RPG with turn-based combat. Heroes of the Seven Islands is a comfy yet challenging adventure with side quests in a vast fairytale world, inspired by 90s games.

name: Oddbat
description: Have you ever wondered how vampires attain immortality? Join this vampire who transforms into a bat to overcome all the challenges that arise, in order to perform a ritual unlike any other!

name: Meshimase! Remilia Ojou-sama!
description: This is a game in which Sakuya, in her spare time, presses various things on Remilia and enjoys her reactions.

name: The Worm's Memoirs
description: The Worm’s Memoirs is a 2D point-and-click narrative game about childhood trauma and what lies beyond it. Follows the Worm as they go through their normal routine of tending a house and uncover their story by traversing between the two parallel worlds of fear and euphoria.

name: Hell Clock
description: Forge powerful builds with endless loot in this relentless combination of Roguelike and ARPG. Blast through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos.

name: Conquest Dark
description: Experience an ARPG's rapid ascension to power in minutes, packed with savage, survivors-like action and devastating sword & sorcery combat. Perfect your builds through Dark Ritual runs that will decide humanity's future as you battle endless hordes across haunting ruins and cursed kingdoms.

name: The Infernal Mist
description: Descend into the Infernal Mist. A MistCrawler Roguelite where you explore, and Hack and Slash your way through the Mist, while surviving the encroaching darkness. Collect Souls of the Mist, unlock god-like powers and weapons, challenge the merciless wardens, and face the King of the Mist.

name: Thing & Fist
description: Team up with a friend and play as either the artful wizard Thing or the stalwart golem Fist to pull off the heist of the century in this couch co-op top-down brawler!

name: Never Shall We Die
description: Sail your ship in this 2D world, in search of treasures and secrets, which pays homage to classic Pixel Art games. Gather your crew to reach your goal stronger.

name: Project 38
description: "Project 38" plunges players into an abandoned research facility where mutated monsters lurk. Uncover the dark secrets within as you navigate eerie corridors and unravel a chilling narrative. With spine-tingling atmosphere and immersive Hindi voice lines, brace yourself for experience like no other.

name: Cast or Pass
description: Battle your friends in a real time card game where wizards sling spells at each other. Has a unique spot as something in between a card game and a fighting game. Games usually take 1-5 minutes, depending on the characters that get picked.

name: Spoopcore 3D
description: Spoopcore 3D is a low-poly 3D platformer/FPS hybrid where you play as a slime named Reggie on a mission to save ducks from across the multiverse and kill a god. Zoom through levels, find secrets, and dispatch enemies using weapon combos.

name: Underwater Abyss
description: This game immerses you in a lush green forest where sunlight filters through the canopy

name: Modulus
description: Modulus is a factory automation game where you cut, color, stamp, and assemble 3D building blocks. Design and optimize sprawling factories with creative freedom to efficiently fulfill the orders of the Grand Neural Network.

name: Trainz 2022: Pro Train: NS Heritage Loco Bundle 1
description: The Evolution Series is a line of diesel locomotives built by GE Transportation Systems, initially designed to meet the U.S. EPA's Tier 2 locomotive emissions standards that took effect in 2005. This dlc features the ES44AC in five Norfolk Southern Heritage liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train: NS Heritage Loco Bundle 1
description: The Evolution Series is a line of diesel locomotives built by GE Transportation Systems, initially designed to meet the U.S. EPA's Tier 2 locomotive emissions standards that took effect in 2005. This dlc features the ES44AC in five Norfolk Southern Heritage liveries.

name: Survive the Squids
description: The Squids are here - but your soldiers are ready. Grow your squad up to 4 members by rescuing survivors. Obtain the best weapons, support, and equipment you can by gathering Squid Samples. Become a force to be reckoned with, one the Squids will fear for generations to come.

name: Busy Streets
description: In this mysterious brown maze game, players will play a brave character trapped in a lineup full of unknown dangers. The maze is filled with winding passages and hidden traps, and players need to carefully avoid the pursuit of monsters while paving the way forward.

name: Little Hero Adventure
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Little Hero Adventure, an exciting 2D platformer game. Explore diverse levels, battle enemies, overcome traps, and collect berries to help your village.

name: Poisonous Abyss
description: It is a novel and unique math puzzle game with a fresh and elegant visual design

name: Steel Warrior
description: Evil company Morning shift studios army has captured Steel warrior birthday cake. Steel warrior need revenge for his army and find all 6 cakes

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train: NS Heritage Loco Bundle 1
description: The Evolution Series is a line of diesel locomotives built by GE Transportation Systems, initially designed to meet the U.S. EPA's Tier 2 locomotive emissions standards that took effect in 2005. This dlc features the ES44AC in five Norfolk Southern Heritage liveries.

name: Lil'Johnny Watermelon Smash
description: Lil Johnny, armed with a watermelon gun, defends his tranquil world from the malevolent dragon Steve. To reach Steve's lair, he faces nineteen timed levels, honing his skills through target practice. Panther Game Design Studio's legacy is a high school class from Ottawa Canada.

name: MyLittlePool
description: It is a neglected swimming pool simulator that runs at the bottom of the screen and can be enjoyed comfortably.

name: AfterM.A.T.H.
description: "AfterM.A.T.H. (Mobile Arsenal Tactical Hunter)" is a sci-fi action game where players pilot advanced mechs to combat the deadly Venomarch creatures. Engage in diverse missions including enemy elimination, hive destruction, new weapon testing, and giant boss battles in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Strike Force Commando
description: Space action adventure set in a desolate world in 2099.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Zodiac - Cancer Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Sir Quest and the Temple of Apollo
description: 3D action adventure where a treasure hunter medieval knight will delve into a greek mysterious temple in search of the flying artifact which, according to mythology, Daedalus used to escape from the Labyrinth of Minotaur.

name: The Final Act
description: The Final Act is a mix of visual novel and puzzle game where you assist writer Rebecca Carter in overcoming her writer's block by crafting the perfect murder plot for her novel. Solve intricate puzzles, adjust crime scenes, and navigate immersive storytelling to uncover the perfect crime.

name: Ognisco
description: Ognisco is a short (1 - 2 hours ), top-down "search action adventure" game inspired by the games of 8-bit era. Your goal is to defeat all the bosses. To do it, you need to explore the world, find new skills, upgrades and secrets. If you're nostalgic for retro gaming, Ognisco is for you!

name: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy
description: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy is a dynamic tower defense. Develop your dungeon and create monsters to guard your territory against adventurers.

name: T-Abyssal Virus: Origin
description: This game is a first person shooting game with a zombie theme, integrating elements such as first person shooting and fighting zombies. In the game, players are in a world plagued by zombies, collecting gem resources, purchasing attributes, and using weapons to eliminate zombies.

name: Drop It! Jelly Man
description: There's only one reason the Jelly Man goes into the deep end. He just needs a beer. Please join him on his dizzying adventure! To survive, you must fall into the water. Continue down. It won't be visible. Still, don't give up and take the courageous plunge!

name: Battle Teams 2: She Panda Gift Pack
description: Unlock the pack now and enhance your gaming experience!

name: Trainz 2019: Model Trainz - Chicago
description: Come on over and run some trains in Chicago! Model Trainz: Chicago is a Chicago themed layout featuring industrial switching and Metra commuter operations along with a staging yard for starting and ending operations.

name: Pirates of Gensokyo
description: Marisa rounds up a most unlikely crew, in search of adventure, and of course, treasure! Interpersonal conflict ensues among the crew, but in the end, their stark differences bring clarity to their personal lives. The real treasure is the one you find within yourself!

name: Frog Escape
description: A frog girl, trapped in an underground lab, overhears a shocking plan to dispose of her. Determined to escape, she sets out to find freedom. Navigate obstacles, avoid enemies, and help her break free!

name: Crazy Voyage
description: Enter this journey and help your pilot to destroy all kinds of opponents that will stand in his way in 6 different worlds. A vertical shooting game with the aim of destroying obstacles and reaching the defined distance to detonate the boss of each level. Travel in this universe of oddities!!!

name: Plant Therapy: Goth Pack
description: Add something dramatic to your life! The Plant Therapy: Goth Pack adds over 35 new gothic and creepy inspired items to the cozy plant collecting game Plant Therapy.

name: Romania Prop Hunt
description: Romania Prop Hunt is a multiplayer game where you play with your friends and hide as a prop, an object from the game, and the Hunter tries to find them!

name: Dissolving Disarray
description: Dissolving Disarray is an RPG Maker adventure horror game. Awaken as a girl lost in a vine-clad room with no recollection of her past. Imprisoned within an otherworldly tower, she must piece together the fragments of her forgotten life and escape before succumbing to the tower's maddening absurdity.

name: Kana Seito Defense
description: Improve your Japanese learning with Kana Seito Defense, a typing defense game to learn the writing systems of Hiragana and Katakana, and to build proficiency in Kanji through extensive practice!

name: Sidewalk Simulator
description: Build your defense, perfect your movement, true your aim. Upgrade and unlock weapons, items, and people to help you destroy tax evaders, the impoverished, and many other demons. Enter this simulation as a small wet boy, and leave completely ENHANCED.

name: Settle and Battle: New Empires
description: A homage to classic real-time strategy games. Gather resources, build an empire, and command powerful armies to conquer the world. Lead six unique tribes, expand your territory, and engage in epic battles with hundreds of units on screen. Dominate in 18 missions and procedurally generated maps!

name: Platform Run
description: Run and complete different kinds of platforms. Platform Run is a 3D platform game where you can interact with different platforms and score.

name: Nedra
description: NEDRA is a story-driven, atmospheric action-adventure blending survival horror with cosmic terror. Set in a Soviet-era Antarctic station, all the explorers have vanished without a trace, leaving you to uncover the chilling truth.

name: The Fallen Kingdom
description: The kingdom is at war and you are the wizard who can save it! Get ready for a 2D isometric journey with spells, combat, bosses, an incredible soundtrack that accompanies the simple, yet epic story!

name: IDET
description: In a diner at the edge of time, murder is afoot. Serve gourmet meals to the ethereal patrons of the Duskrise Diner. Form relationships. Embrace culinary bliss. Infinite day, endless taste.

name: Expedition: Into Darkness
description: Expedition: Into Darkness is a medieval third-person cooperative dungeon crawler and extraction looter. Assemble weapons, customize gear, and join forces with up to four other allies. Survive the ruins—or lose everything you carr

name: Arcane Drifter
description: In this real-time card battler, you arrive in a once-prosperous mining town where the children have vanished and folks who venture into the mine never return. Explore the depths, craft powerful card synergies and save the town.

name: LaserReimu
description:
LaserReimu is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by voidProc, where the player controls Reimu Hakurei in her journey to restore Marisa's magic tool.

Reimu has two primary weapons: a three-way ofuda shot that spreads all over the screen, and secondary laser, where both can be executed at once or separately in two different formations: focused or unfocused.

The game also provides 55 achievements which can be unlocked when the player fulfills certain conditions.

name: Ember's Verge
description: Bushcraft and survive on a deserted island where nature is both your greatest ally and fiercest adversary. As the weather turns colder toward winter, preparation becomes key to survival. Build shelters, hunt, fish, farm, and craft items from natural resources—all without any modern tools.

name: Galactic Loader
description: Galactic Loader is an action-platformer about a space loader who is forgotten on a hostile alien planet which is abandoned by people. The game has various power-ups, big bosses and many monsters that the player needs to defeat. On his journey, the hero finds leftover equipment that provides new abilities for the player. Fight through hordes of alien, giant monsters and escape the planet!

name: Expedition to the Backrooms
description: You are the exploration team from company Async, you arrive to reported anomaly place and searching for anomalies, but what would you find? Prepare yourself for a gripping and heart-pounding adventure in EXPEDITION TO THE BACKROOMS, where every step could be your last.

name: Somewhere
description: The goal of SOMEWHERE is to survive on the wild island of Esterhull. Gather resources, craft tools, and manage hunger, thirst. Explore mysterious locations, uncover the secrets of a lost civilization, and interact with other players: form alliances or compete for survival in a hostile environment.

name: Hell Dive
description: A first-person horror game where you play as Daniel, a Maritime Operative trapped alone aboard a submarine. Sent to investigate an abandoned deep-sea colony, you uncover dark secrets as terrifying horrors await in its depths.

name: Fear & Hunger 3
description: The third installment of the Fear and Hunger franchise, teased by its creator Miro Haverinen, is set to be released in the future.

name: Shadow
description: In SHADOW, expect the unexpected. Every shadow conceals danger, every sound fuels your dread. Dare to survive a night of terror where the darkness is your enemy, and the unknown waits at every turn.

name: Chicken Hill
description: Find 250 Genjouin of various species and hundreds of items for brother KUN. Rescue your frustrated and devastated brother KUN in the KUN space. We are the most devout believers.

name: Wind Traveler
description: This is a semi open world ARPG game with HD2D pixel style. In the game, players will play the role of the story protagonist "Red haired Suka" and embark on an exciting adventure in a beautiful continent called Wind Canyon.

name: RX10-40
description: 『RX10-40』(RX ten forty) is a third-person shooter. Ricocheting Bullets, Shields, and Baton stun guns. An antithesis to an ever-accelerating world.

name: Split Apart
description: A retro survival horror game about envy. There's an unrelenting stench of mold and hostility permeating the stale air of this place. You need to find a way out, by any means necessary.

name: Panzer Strike
description: Authentic RTS gameplay straight out of the 2000s. Command your troops, develop strategies, and win World War II battles. Huge maps, thousands of units, long-range firepower, and no building mechanics!

name: Chi Project
description: Sci-fi fantasy visual novel that combines a turn-based combat system with murder investigation elements.

name: Scramble Up!
description: Scramble Up! is a fast-paced word puzzle game where you rearrange letters to climb through pyramids. Form new words on each level as the timer counts down, adding time with every successful scramble. Test your speed and vocabulary to reach the top before time runs out!

name: Furball Farm
description: Welcome to Furball Farm. The current version only has the orchard map and a small amount of white noise, the remaining white noise will be fixed in the next update. The garden map and food map will be presented in the big update next year, all the updates are free, no purchase, stay tuned.

name: Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite
description: The latest in the “Red Spider” series of Hong Kong noir visual novel with full japanese voice acting, “Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite” is now available with all-new graphics. The hard-boiled story of two female protagonists is set in Thailand in 2009. Play time: 2-4 hours

name: Farm Invaders
description: Top down stealth based puzzle game about an alien stealing cows from a farm. Use futuristic gadgets and stay in the shadows to avoid detection. Get all golds in every level to appease the queen and bring honor to your colony!

name: Space and Lazers
description: A chaotic, 4-player co-op space adventure! Manage your ship, fend off alien threats, and pilot nimble fighter jets as you race to deliver humanity's last hope to a new home.

name: Septic
description: Septic is a gripping precision platformer where you navigate an underground sewer, mastering challenging jumps and dealing with significant setbacks. Test your skills and perseverance in this intense escape adventure.

name: Hellrooms
description: Hellrooms: 4-player co-op horror in liminal spaces. Realistic graphics, procedural levels, terrifying entities. Swim, solve puzzles, survive together. Upgrade characters, master skills. Entities listen to voice chat! Experience classic and new backrooms horrors. Unique playthroughs. Free updates!

name: Train to Hong Kong
description: The sudden appearance of zombies has disrupted the normal course of things, now you and your comrades have to get to a bunker in Hong Kong. Can you survive in a world where force decides everything and every choice has consequences?

name: Biohazard: Siberia
description: Trapped in a secret research facility, you discover a terrifying truth- everything was a simulation… until now. Escape mutated horrors, uncover dark experiments, and decide your fate in this mind-bending, atmospheric survival horror.

name: Benji and the Crystal of Light
description: Descend into the sci-fi action-adventure of Benji Freese as he is forced into a deadly mission by a sadistic computer AI. Scavenge for supplies and upgrade your weapons to shoot your way through intergalactic mercenaries and hordes of undead. Survive the nightmare and find "The Crystal of Light."

name: ShapeScale

name: Carl's Alien Shooting
description: A skirmish with bizarre alien races in space! A massive tide of enemies will surge towards you! You need to choose your own build from various equipment and weapons! 20 Stages! When rogue game meets 2D vertical bullet hell shooting, experience the clash of classic and modern!

name: Blast Judgment
description: Wield an unholy arsenal in this FPS Roguelite. Plunder arcane relics and practice forgotten rituals to take on armies of twisted foes. Seek the cruel gods that pulled you from your grave, and inflict your BLAST JUDGMENT.

name: Comix Zero
description: Become a wise-cracking immortal fighting an evil regime in world’s first “COMIXVANIA”. Every page could be your last. Every death wipes a piece of your memory. A unique mix of genres: beat ‘em up/metroidvania/roguelike based on comics which we call “COMIXVANIA”. Welcome to Comix Zero.

name: Frozen Injustice: Fridge Adventures
description: Clean, fight, and save the fridge in this action-adventure platformer with classic 3D platforming gameplay! Play as Broco-Lee, a Kung Fu trainee, as you battle bacteria, rescue vegetables, and uncover mysteries across the fridge’s floors. Join the dojo and become the hero this epic adventure needs!

name: Portal Factory
description: Portal Factory is an open-world factory-building game with exploration and dungeons. You can play alone or with friends, explore the world through procedural dungeons, and uncover mysteries!

name: Ringer
description: The marble roguelike. Ringer reinvents the classic game of marbles with a deckbuilding twist. Discover game breaking synergies, defeat menacing bosses, and accumulate an ever increasing score in this thrilling roguelike

name: Pebbles Quest
description: The Princess has been kidnapped by evildoers! It is now Pebbles Quest to breach the Castle, face a gauntlet of traps and trials, all to rescue his one true love.

name: Blast-a-Bug!
description: Giant Bugs have invaded our planet and as a soldier it is your duty to help Corporal get rid of them ! Hop into your specially designed ball engine and crush them while trying to preserve citizens integrity !

name: Vagnerun
description: Vagnerun: Race, fight, and upgrade your ship to win thrilling races filled with obstacles and danger!

name: Big Boy Adventure
description: Big Boy Adventure is a casual, singleplayer adventure RPG.Begin the adventure on a small island and help the villagers by fulfilling their requests and keeping them safe from the slimes and monsters that roam the island with increasingly anomalous behavior.

name: Super Ricko’s Islands
description: A FREE 3D platformer-collectathon with dynamic movement controls. Explore different worlds as you master the controls to perform different movement combos and collect all the cores and coins!

name: The Duchess Curse
description: As a security guard tasked with a simple job in a long-abandoned mansion, you quickly find yourself trapped within its haunted walls. Dark secrets unravel as you uncover the tragic tale of the Duchess, who, in a desperate attempt to resurrect her daughter, summoned something far more sinister.

name: Only a Billion?!
description: Congratulations, you won a billion dollars! Now it's time to find a way to spend it. It might prove more difficult than it sounds.

name: Through the Backrooms
description: You as Ethan, a robber who wants to end his criminal past. Suddenly you fall in the Backrooms and now you have to solve the mystery of the liminal rooms to find a way out. But you are not alone here...

name: The Great Sperm Race
description:
"The Great Sperm Race" is an web browser game that takes you on a unique and educational journey through the world of reproduction. In this game, you play the role of a sperm cell on a mission to fertilize an egg and create life.

The gameplay revolves around navigating through a challenging and obstacle-filled environment, mimicking the journey of a sperm cell in the female reproductive system. You'll encounter various obstacles such as acidic environments, immune cells, and other competing sperm cells. Your goal is to swim against the odds, avoid dangers, and be the first to reach the egg.

name: My First Gran Turismo
description:
My First Gran Turismo is a free-to-play, beginner-friendly introduction to the world of racing, crafted to bring the excitement of Gran Turismo to new players. Whether you’re a parent introducing your family to racing or a longtime fan revisiting the series, My First GT captures the essence of those unforgettable first laps in a streamlined, approachable experience.

In My First Gran Turismo, players can unlock achievements by completing a variety of fun and engaging challenges that introduce essential racing techniques, such as cornering, braking, and acceleration. As you progress at each level, you will encounter increasingly intricate tracks and vehicles, each designed to build confidence and refine your driving skills, from basic to more advanced techniques, all in pursuit of mastering the craft of racing.

-Find your Line as you unlock various achievements and set record times across an array of challenges, including three Race Events, Time Trials and License Tests.

-Feel the exhilaration of driving 18 unique cars through a variety of scenarios that sharpen your racing craft on three iconic Gran Turismo circuits: Kyoto Driving Park, Deep Forest Raceway, and Trial Mountain Circuit.

name: Solstice
description:
It's been over a year since that dreaded autumn.

One snowy evening over winter break, Jade decides to accompany Harmony to a concert for a band they both like. What follows is a short story about getting out of your comfort zone, personal realizations, and being there for your friends.

Set one year after the events of Courting Death.

name: Polymega Collection Vol.1: Asteroids
description:
Embark on an intergalactic journey with ASTEROIDS, the iconic arcade game that thrusts players into the heart of a chaotic asteroid field in a frantic fight to survive.

Immerse yourself with lifelike arcade cabinets, complete with multiple zoom and rotation modes that make you feel like you're really standing in front of the machine, as well as new Atari Lynx LCD and Quadrascan Virtual Display Modes, so you can play classic arcade and handheld games that look and feel just like the originals!

Included are foundational influences like LUNAR LANDER, as well as game play evolving entries SPACE DUEL, GRAVITAR, and more to savor your cosmic journey into space.
